allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Next.js project setup with authentication and dashboard

- Set up Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui
- Add Firebase authentication with role-based access control
- Create dashboard layout with sidebar navigation
- Add user management with CRUD operations
- Implement device status monitoring components
- Add Zustand stores for state management
- Include IndexedDB for offline storage support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update Claude settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Day 4: Map & Alerts for Rescuer Dashboard

- Add React-Leaflet map with device markers and status-based colors
- Create alert list component with filtering by status and severity
- Build alert cards with color-coded severity badges
- Implement alert acknowledgment and resolution
- Add rescuer dashboard page combining map and alerts
- Add demo data seeding for devices and alerts
- Fix various linting issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Day 5-7: Campaign Workflow, WebSocket & Reports

Day 5 - Campaign Workflow:
- Campaign card component with status badges and actions
- Status timeline for campaign history visualization
- Campaign assignment dialog for admin users
- Campaign notes functionality
- Campaign list page with tabs and filtering
- Campaign detail page with map, timeline, and notes

Day 6 - WebSocket & Reports:
- WebSocket client with reconnection logic
- Mock WebSocket client for demo mode
- WebSocket provider for real-time updates
- Live connection status indicator in header
- Public alerts page \(read-only view\)
- Reports page with Recharts analytics \(pie, area, bar charts\)

Day 7 - Polish & Demo Prep:
- Enhanced demo data with campaigns and rescuers
- Fixed all TypeScript and ESLint errors
- Updated progress.md documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
